reviews.title: Leaves a little to be desired, but not too bad.
reviews.text: Perichi's has the nicest restaurante that we ate at during our 10 days in Puerto Rico, very good food for a reasonable price. It is a stones throw from the water, but no beach. The grounds and the rooms were clean, nice pool area, and lots of parking space. It may not sound like it, but I mean this review to be more of an informational one than a complaint, because we were comfortable there, but expected a little more. The hottest the hot water got all week was luke warm, and we took a couple of cold showers. The facuet in the sink was on-off, no adjustment for hot and cold, no wash cloths, just towels, no clock, no fridge, no microwave, no plug in the sink, (nice for putting in contacts) and 3 stories high with no elevator.
